message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $80 to me. I am willing to sell it to you for $100. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, I can only pay up to $85 for it. I hope this works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $92.50. This is still above my cost but allows us to reach an agreement. Looking forward to your consideration.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with $88 for the product. This is my highest offer given my budget constraints. I hope we can come to an agreement.
